{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = MetroLinq LW Cloud Enabled 60GHz PTP/PTMP |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.ignitenet.com/products/ML-LW/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = IgniteNet |model = ML-60 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -LW |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AD5800 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point, bridge |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = HEDML60LW, HEDML60PRS4601 |icid = 3857A-ML60LW |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 246000002255X |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4018;Q, IPQ4018, 0VV, NE649WJE, E064900; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 710 <!-- 710 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Winbond;W632GU6MB-12; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8072; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 28:76:10 |oui = 28:76:10
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SFP+ |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sfp_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = at |pwr_poe = 24 |pwr_poe_amp = 1 |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = WiGig, SFP+, PoE |addchip = 2.4GHz RF Front End Module;RFMD (Qorvo);RFFM4252;;2; ,,, 5GHz RF Front End Module;RFMD (Qorvo);RFFM4552;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ad
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Accton |manuf_model = ML60LW |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/30/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B078MS7BD3 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = 28:76:10 |rad1_ant_conn = IPEX |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = 28:76:10 |rad2_ant_conn = IPEX |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3mod = IgniteNet RDO-60-FB-USBB-18BF |rad3modif = USB 3.0 |rad3chip1 = Peraso;PRS4601; |rad3chip2 = Peraso;PRS1151; |rad3oui = 28:76:10 |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 1 |rad3rxchains = 1 |rad3sstreams = 1 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11ad |rad3ad = 4620 |rad3freq = 60
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[[IgniteNet ML-60-LW]] - ''MetroLinq LW Cloud Enabled 60GHz PTP/PTMP'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML60LW HEDML60LW] (2018-01-30) - ''w/ 5GHz Failover + 2GHz AP'' :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018 @710MHz (Quad Core) WiSoC • [https://www.balticnetworks.com/ignitenet-metrolinq-lw-60ghz-cloud-enabled-ptp-ptmp-w-5ghz-failover-2ghz-ap.html BN] :WLAN: [[Peraso]] PRS4601 (BB/MAC/PHY) + PRS1151 (RFIC) (USB 3.0) :LAN: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8072 (1GbE) / HEDML60PRS4601 *[[IgniteNet RDO-60-FB-USBB-18BF]] - ''Metrolinq 60GHz Module'' (USB 3.0) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML60PRS4601 HEDML60PRS4601] (2017-10-26) • [[Accton]] :WLAN: [[Peraso]] PRS4601 (BB/MAC/PHY) + PRS1151 (RFIC) - X710 (?) ::"142000001731X REV:0B", "PER805-02", "1736" - [https://fccid.io/HEDML60PRS4601/External-Photos/External-Photos-3616968 PCB]
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://www.prweb.com/releases/2017/09/prweb14753392.htm ''IgniteNet MetroLinq 2.5G 60 Beamforming Sector'' on '''PCWeb'''] *[https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/ignitenet-announces-the-metrolinq-60-base-station-sector---worlds-first-commercial-60ghz-point-to-multipoint-broadband-system-300278895.html ''IgniteNet MetroLinq 60 Base Station Sector'' on '''PRNewsWire''']
==See also== *[[IgniteNet ML-60-10G-360]] - ''MetroLinq 10G Tri-Band Omni'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML10G360 HEDML10G360] (2018-03-21) / HEDML60PRS4601 (x3) *[[IgniteNet ML-60-LW]] - ''MetroLinq LW Cloud Enabled 60GHz PTP/PTMP'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML60LW HEDML60LW] (2018-01-30) - ''w/ 5GHz Failover + 2GHz AP'' *[[IgniteNet ML2.5-60-BF-18]] - ''Metrolinq 2.5 Outdoor 60GHz PTMP + 5GHz'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML2560 HEDML2560] (2017-09-29) / HEDML60PRS4601 :*[[IgniteNet RDO-60-FB-USBB-18BF]] - ''Metrolinq 60GHz Module'' ::FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML60PRS4601 HEDML60PRS4601] (2017-10-26)
*[[IgniteNet ML-60-30-18]] - ''Metrolinq Outdoor 60GHz PTP + 5GHz'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HED-ML6035G3 HED-ML6035G3] (2016-05-11) / HED-ML60MDSB :*[[IgniteNet RDO-60-FB-USBB-18]] - ''Metrolinq 60GHz Module'' ::FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HED-ML60MDSB HED-ML60MDSB] (2016-05-05)
*[[IgniteNet ML-60-35]] (-1) - ''Metrolinq Outdoor 60GHz PTP + 5GHz'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HED-ML6035 HED-ML6035] (2015-12-31)
